doc.field: V RM f2165reute b f BC-/U.S-SENATE-OVERRIDES 04-02 0051
U.S SENATE OVERRIDES REAGAN'S HIGHWAY BILL VETO

The Senate overrode President Reagan's veto of an 88 billion dlr highway funding bill, 67-33. The measure now becomes law. It was a major personal loss for Reagan, who came to the Capitol earlier in the day to campaign for support. Reuter
